product_name: Eagle Creek No Matter What Flashpoint Wheeled Duffel - X-Large
long_description: Got a lot of heavy, bulky climbing or watersports gear to haul? Let the X-large No Matter What Flashpoint Wheeled Duffel from Eagle Creek tackle the job with ease. Built tough, the duffel is made of extra-durable, water-resistant and abrasion-resistant polyester fabric; bartacks reinforce all stress points. Convenient collapsible design lets you stow the duffel in its included stuff pouch, which can double as a shoe or gear bag inside the duffel. Oversize wheels aid mobililty over urban obstacles; pulls by way of a sturdy adjustable handle. Removable, padded shoulder strap included; end and center haul handles aid lifting. Self-repairing, #10 zipper is backed by a storm flap; external zippered pocket holds easy-to-access items. No Matter What Flashpoint Wheeled Duffel has external compression straps that secure and stabilize your load.
short_description: Got a lot of heavy, bulky climbing or watersports gear to haul? Let the X-large No Matter What Flashpoint Wheeled Duffel from Eagle Creek tackle the job with ease.
